name: Bingo Caller
description: Bingo Caller is an application to generate numbers between one and seventy-five.  As each number is called it is then grayed out in the on screen grid so that when Bingo is called it is easy to reference if it is a true Bingo or not.  Bingo Caller is meant to be used along side 'Bingo Card.'  'Bingo Card' is a free application from 1026 Development used to mark off the numbers called by Bingo Caller to play a game of Bingo.
